Chapter Next

class gstBoundedHapticObj : public gstTransform

Base class for haptic objects that utilize a bounding volume.

From header file: gstBoundedHapticObj.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstBoundedHapticObjDestructor.
gstBoundedHapticObjThis class is intended as a base class only, the constructors are protected so that instances can not be created.
gstBoundedHapticObjCopy Ctor.
gstBoundedHapticObj
Functions
AsBoundedHapticObj Downcast function.
boundByBox Utility method to bound the haptic object by a box.
boundBySphere Utility method to bound the haptic object by a sphere.
getNeedsUpdate Does the bounding volume need updating.
setNeedsUpdate Set the state of the bounding volume w.
getClassTypeId Static: get type id of this class.
staticIsOfType Return TRUE if class is of the given type or is derived from that type.
Virtual Functions
getBoundingVolumeGet the gstBoundingVolume instance currently associated with the haptic object.
getDistanceFromBoundingVolumeWCThis method will return the closest distance from the input point to the bounding volume.
getTypeIdVirtual form of getClassTypeId.
invalidateCumTransfInvalidate the cumulative transform for the object This will trigger the recalculation of the bounding sphere in world coordinates.
isOfTypeVirtual form of staticIsOfType.
setBoundingVolumeAssign a gstBoundingVolume instance to the haptic object.
withinBoundingVolumeReturns TRUE or FALSE depending on if the sphere intersects the bounding volume.
